safetyTips: Goods are stored in a separate room in the premises. Collections can be left outside the premises for customers to pick up. Deliveries are via Royal Mail in the main.
name: BETSY & BLUE BOUTIQUE
address: Kingsford Street, Mersham, Ashford, Kent, TN25 6PE
description: Hi, we're Betsy & Blue Boutique; an online retail store specialising in gorgeous Gifts, Homeware, Accessories and Body & Bath products. There is no minimum spend, and we offer a delivery by Royal Mail with a shipping cost option, or a free Local Collection option whereby locals can collect their goods for free from our TN25 address. We can also hand deliver to the TN24 & TN25 areas if you are in a hurry for your items. We offer a free gift wrapping service too, so we can post gifts to your loved ones for special occasions.
